sentences.english: Maternal diabetes increases the risk of fetal macrosomia and shoulder dystocia.
sentences.chinese: 糖尿病孕妇生育巨大胎儿及发生肩难产的危险性增加。

sentences.english: Chlamydia screening is recommended for all pregnant women.
sentences.chinese: 所有孕妇有必要行衣原体筛查。

sentences.english: Radiological health protection standards for X-ray examinations of child-bearing age women and pregnant women.
sentences.chinese: 育龄妇女和孕妇的X线检查放射卫生防护标准。

sentences.english: These are complex and diverse phenomena, but their influences on pregnant women are often underestimated.
sentences.chinese: 然而，这个现象对孕妇的影响却往往被轻估。

sentences.english: Maternal pulmonary oedema has been reported with tocolysis and fluid overload.
sentences.chinese: 资料显示孕妇肺水肿并伴随液体超负荷与安胎。

sentences.english: Dr. Arthur Pang is examining a pregnant woman with traditional instrument in Darfur.
sentences.chinese: 彭伟强医生在达尔富尔地区为一名孕妇检查。

sentences.english: Pregnant and nursing mom’s should also not consume goji.
sentences.chinese: 而且，孕妇和处于护理期的母亲是被禁止服用枸杞的。

sentences.english: So, the maternity swimsuit is a fairly essential bit of kit.
sentences.chinese: 因此，孕妇泳衣绝对是必备的装备。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To explore the full-term pregnancy the amniotic fluid of pregnant women decreased vaginal delivery security.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨足月妊娠羊水偏少的孕妇阴式分娩的安全性。

sentences.english: Gravida can pass through pregnant period with treatment.
sentences.chinese: 经采取相应治疗措施后孕妇能度过妊娠期。

sentences.english: We determined urine iodine of 6105 pregnant women with cerous sulfate reducing reaction.
sentences.chinese: 本文采用硫酸铈法测定了6105例孕妇的尿碘。

sentences.english: Pregnant women need 70 mg of vitamin C a day.
The doctor had to abort the pregnancy.
WARNING: Not intended for use by pregnant or nursing women. If you are taking any medications, consult your doctor before use.
sentences.chinese: 孕妇，哺乳期妇女或服药者，服用前请咨询医生。

sentences.english: This is one of the dirty secrets of the maternity industry.
sentences.chinese: 这是孕妇产业的一个肮脏的小秘密。

definition: woman recuperating after childbirth/woman in childbirth
to give birth without complications/easy childbirth/safe delivery/natural birth (without surgical operation)
